home.title: Deeplink worth sharing on LinkedIn to boost your conversions | PIMMS
home.description: Deeplink open your online content in the appropriate mobile apps, driving more conversion and growth. They provide a seamless user experience. Works for LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, etc.

youtube.title: Deeplink to boost your subscribers on YouTube | PIMMS
youtube.description: Stop losing subscribers with traditional links. Deeplink open your videos in the official YouTube app, driving more subscribers and growth. Works for LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, etc.
